opis: Privlaka Samostojeća novoizgrađena katnica s bazenom na izvrsnoj lokaciji u turističkom naselju Privlaka. Objekt se nalazi na svega 50m udaljenosti od mora i uređene plaže. Sastoji se od jedne stambene jedinice s kuhinjom i dnevnim boravkom, 4 spavaće sobe, 3 kupaonice i jednim WC-om te pripadajućim terasama. Objekt je dovršen 2019. godine te se prodaje kompletno namješten. S terasa se pruža prekrasan pogled na more. Ostale informacije na upit. Agencijska naknada sukladno Općim uvjetima poslovanja. Cjelokupni kupoprodajni proces vođen od strane našeg ovlaštenog Odvjetničkog tima. OBILAZAK NEKRETNINE OSIGURAN 7/7 DANA PO PRETHODNOM DOGOVORU! Privlaka Detached newly built house with a pool in a great location in the tourist resort of Privlaka. The property is located only 50m away from the sea and the beach. It consists of one residential unit with a kitchen and living room, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and one toilet with adjoining terraces. The building was completed in 2019 and is sold fully furnished. The terraces offer a beautiful sea view. Other information on request. Brokerage fee in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions. The entire purchase/sale process is managed by our authorized law office. TOUR OF THE PROPERTY INSURED 7/7 DAYS BY PRIOR ARRANGEMENT! Privlaka Freistehendes neu gebautes Haus mit Pool in toller Lage im Ferienort Privlaka. Das Anwesen befindet sich nur 50 m vom Meer und Strand entfernt. Es besteht aus einer Wohneinheit mit Küche und Wohnzimmer, 4 Schlafzimmer, 3 Badezimmer und eine Toilette mit angrenzenden Terrassen. Das Gebäude wurde 2019 fertiggestellt und wird komplett möbliert verkauft. Die Terrassen bieten einen wunderschönen Meerblick. Weitere Informationen auf Anfrage.
